column3: As noted [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14247#discussion_r218252492), we might as well remove the function param entirely.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #14258 (Remove redundant parameter fCheckDuplicateInputs from CheckTransaction(...) by practicalswift)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Indeed, looks like #14258 is doing a similar thing.
This is a popular bug fix. I was curious and was about to submit the same PR :laughing:
